{"id":674756842,"lang":"cpp","time":"3 months, 1 week","timestamp":1649214627,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"68 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/674756842/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"21.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> threeSum(vector<int>& nums) {\n        std::vector<std::vector<int>> result;\n        std::sort(nums.begin(), nums.end());\n        \n        for(int i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++)\n        {\n            int target = -nums[i];\n            int front = i+1, back = nums.size()-1;\n            while(front < back)\n            {\n                int sum = nums[front] + nums[back];\n                if(sum < target) front++;\n                else if(sum > target) back--;\n                else\n                {\n                    std::vector<int> triplet = {nums[i], nums[front], nums[back]};\n                    result.push_back(triplet);\n                    while(front < back && nums[front] == triplet[1]) front++;\n                    while(front < back && nums[front] == triplet[2]) back--;\n                }\n            }\n            while(i+1 < nums.size() && nums[i] == nums[i+1]) i++;\n        }\n        return result;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum"}
